message: Take one dollar and be happy. You get nothing if we don't agree.
I'm feeling generous, Alice. Take it or leave it. This is the best offer you'll get.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fairer share. This is my final offer.
The tables have turned, Alice. This is my final offer. You're running out of time!
We're both losing money with every round. Let's settle on a deal before it's too late.
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer is more than fair considering the time pressure and your shrinking gains. Don't be greedy.
This is our last chance. Let's split the money evenly and end this.
